name: CHICKADEE
tagline: Cutting-edge LoRaWAN® Device for Tracking People and Assets
description: CHICKADEE is a state-of-the-art LoRaWAN® device designed to revolutionize personnel and asset tracking. Utilizing low-power positioning capabilities via LoRa Edge™, it offers precise GPS, BLE, and Wi-Fi positioning for both outdoor and indoor environments. Seamlessly integrating into existing LoRaWAN® networks, CHICKADEE enhances security and operational efficiency by providing real-time location information and instant alerts, making it ideal for securing construction sites, warehouses, manufacturing facilities, and multi-building campuses.

specifications.title: Form Factor
specifications.value: Badge form factor for versatile deployment on clothing, equipment, or assets

specifications.title: Connectivity
specifications.value: LoRaWAN® with support for all Global ISM Bands

specifications.title: Additional Features
specifications.value: Accelerometer, Passive RFID, Configurable Button for Event-Based Uplinks (SOS)

features: Outdoor Positioning via GPS and Low-Power GNSS
Indoor Positioning via BLE and Wi-Fi Sniffing
Badge Form Factor for seamless deployment
